201

Chapter 19 - Responsibilities of Parenthood
 
     ELLEN WHITE MADE MANY BEAUTIFUL STATEMENTS REGARDING THE VALUE OF THE FAMILY, CHILDREN, AND THE HOME. SHE FULLY RECOGNIZED THEIR IMPORTANCE. AT THE SAME TIME SHE ALSO RECOGNIZED THAT YOUNG PEOPLE CONTEMPLATING MARRIAGE SHOULD TAKE INTO CONSIDERATION ALL THAT IS INVOLVED IN HAVING CHILDREN AND REARING THEM TO BECOME ALL THAT GOD AND THE PARENTS WOULD LIKE THEM TO BE.
